attributes.action: create a two tiered housng market to provide local homes for local people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: First time home buyers are unable to stay in the areas they grew up in because prices are inflated by second home owners or incomers with greater disposable assets. In the channel islands this works very well, they provide a local market for local people only and an open market only for those with substantially more income.
